english.segment1: She dont know what she wants to be. With all the pictures in the magazines. Holding hands when shes mad at me. Cause she dont wanna go dont wanna go. I met her at anthropology. Her purple boots and her golden dreams. Standing there like a Tennesse Queen. Singing dont look at me dont look at me
english.segment2: Singing Oh Oh wont you help me sing this song. Singing The EEE EEE she dont ever wanna go to sleep
english.segment3: . Singing Hey Mama dont want no drama just a kiss before I leave (Woo Ohhhh). Hey lady dont say maybe youre the one that I can believe (Woo Ohhhh). Hey lover dont want no other. Finger for my ring (Woo Ohhhh). Hey mama hey hey mama (X4). Oh Oh O O O O Oh. Oh Oh O O Oh
english.segment4: I could see it in her Cherokee eyes. Those baby browns and her golden thighs. What you doing for the rest of your life. Cause I dont wanna go, dont wanna go
english.segment5: Singing Oh Oh wont you help me sing this song. Singing EEE EEE EEE she's playing like a mystery
english.segment6: Singing Hey Mama dont want no drama just a kiss before I leave (Woo Ohhhh). Hey lady dont say maybe youre the one that I can believe (Woo Ohhhh). Hey lover dont want no other. Finger for my ring (Woo Ohhhh). Hey mama hey hey mama X4. Oh Oh O O O O Oh. Oh Oh O O Oh O O O-Oh
english.segment7: We couldnt be more opposite. Im hard to please and your hard to get. Youre Mississippi and Im Oregon. Youre sun tanned and Im porcelain
english.segment8: Singing Hey Mama dont want no drama just a kiss before I leave (Woo Ohhhh). Hey lady dont say maybe youre the one that I can believe(Woo Ohhhh). Hey lover dont want no other. Finger for my ring (Woo Ohhhh). Hey mama hey hey mama X4. (alright). Oh oh, oh-oh-oh-oh-oh, oh oh
